meta.title: Integration Scorecard - Measure Human Flourishing Across Six Domains
meta.description: A comprehensive assessment tool based on Project Janus framework to measure integration across biological, cognitive, emotional, behavioral, social, and spiritual/existential dimensions.

hero.title: The Integration Scorecard
hero.subtitle: Measure what truly matters: human flourishing across all dimensions of being

intro.title: A New Way to Measure Wellbeing
intro.text1: Traditional metrics measure productivity, GDP, or isolated health markers. But human flourishing requires integration across all aspects of our existence—biological, cognitive, emotional, behavioral, social, and spiritual.
intro.text2: The Integration Scorecard is a practical assessment tool based on the Project Janus framework, designed to help individuals, organizations, and communities measure their true state of integration—and identify where support is needed most.

domains.title: The Six Domains of Human Integration

biological.title: Biological
biological.description: The physical foundation of all human experience
biological.point1: Sleep quality and circadian rhythm alignment
biological.point2: Stress physiology and nervous system regulation
biological.point3: Movement, nutrition, and connection to nature

cognitive.title: Cognitive
cognitive.description: Patterns of attention, thinking, and information processing
cognitive.point1: Attention span and capacity for deep focus
cognitive.point2: Screen time and information diet quality

emotional.title: Emotional
emotional.description: The landscape of feelings and affective states
emotional.point2: Safety to express full range of emotions
emotional.point3: Access to joy, peace, and positive affect

behavioral.title: Behavioral
behavioral.description: The alignment between values and daily actions
behavioral.point3: Agency and freedom in daily choices

social.title: Social
social.description: The web of relationships and community belonging
social.point1: Quality of close relationships and intimacy

spiritual.title: Spiritual/Existential
spiritual.description: Meaning, purpose, and connection to something larger
spiritual.point1: Sense of life purpose and direction
spiritual.point2: Alignment with core values and principles
spiritual.point3: Moments of transcendence, awe, and wonder

howto.title: How to Use the Scorecard
howto.intro: The Integration Scorecard works at multiple scales—from personal reflection to organizational transformation to community wellbeing assessment.

individuals.title: For Individuals & Families
individuals.description: Assess your personal integration, identify where you're flourishing and where you need support, track progress over time, and make values-aligned life decisions.

organizations.title: For Organizations
organizations.description: Evaluate team wellbeing beyond productivity metrics, design work environments that support human integration, identify systemic barriers to flourishing, and create truly regenerative culture.

cities.title: For Cities & Communities
cities.description: Measure community wellbeing across all domains, identify infrastructure gaps for human integration, track progress toward regenerative governance, and prioritize interventions that matter most.

download.title: Download the Scorecard
download.description: The Integration Scorecard is freely available in both English and Swedish. Use it for personal reflection, organizational assessment, or community wellbeing measurement.
download.note: PDF format • Free to use and share • Updated regularly based on community feedback

consciousness.title: Consciousness & Inner Development
consciousness.description: Explore the developmental frameworks that inform the Integration Scorecard's spiritual and cognitive domains.

enterprise.title: Regenerative Enterprise
enterprise.description: Apply integration principles to organizational design and workplace culture transformation.

bioregional.title: Bioregional Polis
bioregional.description: Scale integration thinking to community and bioregional governance systems.
